results.title: Synergistic Effect of Simvastatin and Romidepsin on Gamma-globin Gene Induction
results.text_hl: Also, no serious side effect has been reported following long-period usage of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@, yet. Moreover, @CHEMICAL_romidepsin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C087123 @@@ROM@@@ is using for @<m>DISEASE_Lymphoma_T_Cell_Cutaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016410 @@@cutaneous T-cell lymphoma@@@ treatment and both drugs are approved by the FDA.

citations.NLM: Habibi H, Atashi A, Abroun S, Noruzinia M. Synergistic Effect of Simvastatin and Romidepsin on Gamma-globin Gene Induction Cell J. 2019 Jan;20(4):576-583. PMID: 30124006
